segments.text: Excuse me . I've been waiting for my main dish for quite a time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir.Just a minute , please , I'll check with the kitchen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for waiting.It takes another ten to fifteen minutes , I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have an appointment in half an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have anything else I can have instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yes.How about beef stew ? We can serve you at once .
segments.speaker: S1
